net.jxta.impl.endpoint.netty
Interface TransportComponent

All Known Subinterfaces:
TransportClientComponent, TransportServerComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
NettyTransportClient, NettyTransportServer, NullTransportClientComponent, NullTransportComponent, NullTransportServerComponent
public interface TransportComponent

Represents a (potentially optional) component of a transport implementation, which can be started and stopped.

Method Summary
 void beginStop()
          Instruct the component to begin it's shutdown sequence, releasing external resources as necessary.
 boolean start(EndpointService endpointService)
          Start the component, which may register itself with the provided endpoint service to provide functionality to the wider JXTA stack.
 void stop()
          Complete the shutdown of a transport component, potentially blocking until this is complete.
 

Method Detail

start

boolean start(EndpointService endpointService)
Start the component, which may register itself with the provided endpoint service to provide functionality to the wider JXTA stack.

Returns:
whether the startup sequence succeeded or not.

beginStop

void beginStop()
Instruct the component to begin it's shutdown sequence, releasing external resources as necessary.

stop

void stop()
Complete the shutdown of a transport component, potentially blocking until this is complete.
